Gems of Harmony
Aynho Park, Aynho, Northamptonshire 4th annual contest "Confined to Bands who have have not won a cash prize exceeding £5 since 1926." Prizes - 1st £5 and shield, 2nd £3, 3rd £2. Best Cornet: Northampton Best Horn: West Bromwich Best Euphonium: Rugby Best Trombone: Northampton
Feb. 17, 2013, 9:33 a.m. Nov. 29, 2018, 1:19 p.m.
